Detailed Description

Implementation class of pincers.

vtkToolGPincers is the class that implements the pincers tool, inside the scene. Contains methods for position control of the tool in the scene and collision detection. Pincers are composed of 3 pieces: 1 stick and 2 graspers (vtkPiece)
